logquery.where_1: WHERE STARTTIME >= '[[%%STARTTIME%%]]' AND TXNID = '[[%%TXNID%%]]' AND ( LOADAPEND.TXNMSGCODE LIKE '[[%%RTNMSGCODE%%]]%' OR LOADAPEND.SYSMSGCODE LIKE '[[%%RTNMSGCODE%%]]%') ORDER BY LOADAPBEGIN.LOGID DESC
logquery.where_2: WHERE STARTTIME >= '[[%%STARTTIME%%]]' ORDER BY LOADAPBEGIN.LOGID DESC
logquery.where_3: WHERE TXNID = '[[%%TXNID%%]]' ORDER BY LOADAPBEGIN.LOGID DESC
logquery.where_4: WHERE ( LOADAPEND.TXNMSGCODE LIKE '[[%%RTNMSGCODE%%]]%' OR LOADAPEND.SYSMSGCODE LIKE '[[%%RTNMSGCODE%%]]%') ORDER BY LOADAPBEGIN.LOGID DESC
logquery.where_5: WHERE STARTTIME >= '[[%%STARTTIME%%]] AND TXNID = '[[%%TXNID%%]]' ORDER BY LOADAPBEGIN.LOGID DESC
logquery.where_6: WHERE TXNID = '[[%%TXNID%%]]' AND ( LOADAPEND.TXNMSGCODE LIKE '[[%%RTNMSGCODE%%]]%' OR LOADAPEND.SYSMSGCODE LIKE '[[%%RTNMSGCODE%%]]%') ORDER BY LOADAPBEGIN.LOGID DESC
logquery.where_7: WHERE STARTTIME >= '[[%%STARTTIME%%]]' AND ( LOADAPEND.TXNMSGCODE LIKE '[[%%RTNMSGCODE%%]]%' OR LOADAPEND.SYSMSGCODE LIKE '[[%%RTNMSGCODE%%]]%') ORDER BY LOADAPBEGIN.LOGID DESC

root.logquery: SELECT LOADAPBEGIN.LOGID , PAGEID , SESSID , APTYPE , TXNID , STARTTIME , LOADAPEND.ENDTIME , COMEFROM , LOADAPEND.TXNMSGCODE , LOADAPEND.SYSMSGCODE , LOADAPEND.RUNTIME FROM DB2IBANK.LOADAPBEGIN AS LOADAPBEGIN FULL OUTER JOIN DB2IBANK.LOADAPEND AS LOADAPEND ON LOADAPBEGIN.LOGID = LOADAPEND.LOGID
